pageContext.claim: “They're not journalists; they're thieves -- all of those journalists that received a Pulitzer Prize should be forced to give those Pulitzer Prizes back because they were all wrong. There was no -- because if you saw today, more documents came out, saying there was absolutely no collusion with Russia.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to reporters from The New York Times and The Washington Post who won a shared Pulitzer Prize for their reporting on Russian interference in the 2016 election. Nothing in their Pulitzer-winning stories has been proven incorrect.
